mapper.sql: CUSTOMER, T_SOURCE_CUSTOMER, CUSTOMER_CONTACT, NAME, TEMPLATE, TASK_ID, TASK_REPORTED_NAME, PRIORITY, COMMON_NAME, REPORT_NAME, PRODUCT_SERIES, ASSIGNED_SAMPLE_QUANTITY, CONDITION, TEST_GROUP, INST_ARRANGE_NO, ASSGIN_TO, CONCLUSION, DATE_CREATED, DATE_RECEIVED, PLAN_START_DATE, PLAN_END_DATE, ACTURE_START_DATE, PREDICT_END_DATE, ACTURE_END_DATE, REVIEWED_ON, RPT_AUTHORIZED_ON, RPT_AUTHORIZED_BY, QUOTES, ACTUAL_FEE, TITLE, SEQ_NUM, TS,REPORT_UPLOAD_DATE,RPT_ASSGIN_TO,REPORT_UPLOAD_USER,REPORT_SIGN_DATE,REPORT_SIGN_USER,C_ANALYST_SUBMIT_DATE,C_ANALYST_SUBMIT_BY,C_COA_FORMAT,VDEF1,C_ADDRESS
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from ALL_TASK
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into ALL_TASK (CUSTOMER, T_SOURCE_CUSTOMER, CUSTOMER_CONTACT, NAME, TEMPLATE, TASK_ID, TASK_REPORTED_NAME, PRIORITY, COMMON_NAME, REPORT_NAME, PRODUCT_SERIES, ASSIGNED_SAMPLE_QUANTITY, CONDITION, TEST_GROUP, INST_ARRANGE_NO, ASSGIN_TO, CONCLUSION, DATE_CREATED, DATE_RECEIVED, PLAN_START_DATE, PLAN_END_DATE, ACTURE_START_DATE, PREDICT_END_DATE, ACTURE_END_DATE, REVIEWED_ON, RPT_AUTHORIZED_ON, RPT_AUTHORIZED_BY, QUOTES, ACTUAL_FEE, TITLE, SEQ_NUM, TS) values (#{customer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tSourceCustomer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{template,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskReportedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productSeries,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assignedSampleQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{condition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{testGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instArrangeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assginTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{conclusion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateCreated,jdbcType=DATE}, #{dateReceived,jdbcType=DATE}, #{planStartDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{planEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{actureStartDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{predictEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{actureEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{reviewedOn,jdbcType=DATE}, #{rptAuthorizedOn,jdbcType=DATE}, #{rptAuthorizedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quotes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{actualFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seqNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ts,jdbcType=CHAR})

mapper.update:
update ALL_TASK
CUSTOMER = #{record.customer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
T_SOURCE_CUSTOMER = #{record.tSourceCustomer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMER_CONTACT = #{record.customerContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEMPLATE = #{record.template,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TASK_ID = #{record.taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TASK_REPORTED_NAME = #{record.taskReportedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRIORITY = #{record.priority,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMMON_NAME = #{record.commonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPORT_NAME = #{record.reportName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_SERIES = #{record.productSeries,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSIGNED_SAMPLE_QUANTITY = #{record.assignedSampleQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CONDITION = #{record.condition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEST_GROUP = #{record.testGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INST_ARRANGE_NO = #{record.instArrangeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSGIN_TO = #{record.assginTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONCLUSION = #{record.conclusion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATE_CREATED = #{record.dateCreated,jdbcType=DATE},
DATE_RECEIVED = #{record.dateReceived,jdbcType=DATE},
PLAN_START_DATE = #{record.planStartDate,jdbcType=DATE},
PLAN_END_DATE = #{record.planEndDate,jdbcType=DATE},
ACTURE_START_DATE = #{record.actureStartDate,jdbcType=DATE},
PREDICT_END_DATE = #{record.predictEndDate,jdbcType=DATE},
ACTURE_END_DATE = #{record.actureEndDate,jdbcType=DATE},
REVIEWED_ON = #{record.reviewedOn,jdbcType=DATE},
RPT_AUTHORIZED_ON = #{record.rptAuthorizedOn,jdbcType=DATE},
RPT_AUTHORIZED_BY = #{record.rptAuthorizedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUOTES = #{record.quotes,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACTUAL_FEE = #{record.actualFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TITLE = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEQ_NUM = #{record.seqNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TS = #{record.ts,jdbcType=CHAR},

update ALL_TASK set CUSTOMER = #{record.customer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, T_SOURCE_CUSTOMER = #{record.tSourceCustomer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMER_CONTACT = #{record.customerContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEMPLATE = #{record.template,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TASK_ID = #{record.taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TASK_REPORTED_NAME = #{record.taskReportedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRIORITY = #{record.priority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMON_NAME = #{record.commonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORT_NAME = #{record.reportName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_SERIES = #{record.productSeries,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSIGNED_SAMPLE_QUANTITY = #{record.assignedSampleQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CONDITION = #{record.condition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEST_GROUP = #{record.testGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INST_ARRANGE_NO = #{record.instArrangeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSGIN_TO = #{record.assginTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONCLUSION = #{record.conclusion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATE_CREATED = #{record.dateCreated,jdbcType=DATE}, DATE_RECEIVED = #{record.dateReceived,jdbcType=DATE}, PLAN_START_DATE = #{record.planStartDate,jdbcType=DATE}, PLAN_END_DATE = #{record.planEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, ACTURE_START_DATE = #{record.actureStartDate,jdbcType=DATE}, PREDICT_END_DATE = #{record.predictEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, ACTURE_END_DATE = #{record.actureEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, REVIEWED_ON = #{record.reviewedOn,jdbcType=DATE}, RPT_AUTHORIZED_ON = #{record.rptAuthorizedOn,jdbcType=DATE}, RPT_AUTHORIZED_BY = #{record.rptAuthorizedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUOTES = #{record.quotes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ACTUAL_FEE = #{record.actualFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TITLE = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEQ_NUM = #{record.seqNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TS = #{record.ts,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select:
select distinct CUSTOMER, T_SOURCE_CUSTOMER, CUSTOMER_CONTACT, NAME, TEMPLATE, TASK_ID, TASK_REPORTED_NAME, PRIORITY, COMMON_NAME, REPORT_NAME, PRODUCT_SERIES, ASSIGNED_SAMPLE_QUANTITY, CONDITION, TEST_GROUP, INST_ARRANGE_NO, ASSGIN_TO, CONCLUSION, to_char(DATE_CREATED,'yyyy-mm-dd') DATE_CREATED, to_char(DATE_RECEIVED,'yyyy-mm-dd') DATE_RECEIVED, to_char(PLAN_START_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') PLAN_START_DATE, to_char(PLAN_END_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') PLAN_END_DATE, to_char(ACTURE_START_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') ACTURE_START_DATE, to_char(PREDICT_END_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') PREDICT_END_DATE, to_char(ACTURE_END_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') ACTURE_END_DATE, to_char(REVIEWED_ON,'yyyy-mm-dd') REVIEWED_ON, to_char(RPT_AUTHORIZED_ON,'yyyy-mm-dd') RPT_AUTHORIZED_ON, RPT_AUTHORIZED_BY, QUOTES, ACTUAL_FEE, TITLE, SEQ_NUM, TS,
REPORT_UPLOAD_DATE, RPT_ASSGIN_TO,REPORT_UPLOAD_USER,
REPORT_SIGN_DATE, REPORT_SIGN_USER,C_ANALYST_SUBMIT_DATE,C_ANALYST_SUBMIT_BY,C_COA_FORMAT, VDEF1,C_ADDRESS from ALL_TASK where 1 = 1
${_parameter}
order by date_created desc
